channel.title: #179: (Peldi) The GDPR 3 years later with Aleth Gueguen of GDPR for SaaS
channel.description:
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/5e8fb1a2-4cef-4f25-a9a8-d7325c82bfc9?dark=false"></iframe>
Peldi Guilizzoni (@peldi) steps in as host this week, and chats with [GDPR expert Aleth Gueguen](https://gdpr4saas.eu/) about how the GDPR is shaping and affecting our SaaS businesses.
Topics include:
* Is the GDPR being enforced? * How has it changed our businesses? * How can we shape new businesses to ensure we meet data protection requirements? * Does the GDPR give larger businesses an unfair advantage?
You can also [watch this episode on YouTube](https://youtu.be/ci83MpOBUZc).

item.title: #179: (Peldi) The GDPR 3 years later with Aleth Gueguen of GDPR for SaaS
item.dc:creator: AlethG
item.description:
Hey everybody!
I’m Aleth, I’ve just subscribed to the community.
I’ll be happy to chat about privacy or anything product related!

Read full topic
